subtitle: Slope of EMA — direction and steepness of trend.

measures.how_to_read: Positive slope indicates uptrend acceleration; negative slope indicates downtrend.
measures.typical_ranges: Ticker and timeframe dependent; compare relative to history.
measures.caveats: Can flip rapidly on very short windows; smooth as needed.
measures.what_it_measures: Ema Slope derived from market data.

best_when: As a trend filter for entries

assistant_hints: Positive slope supports long bias; negative supports short bias.
Magnitude matters — compare to historical distribution.
Smooth or step up timeframe to reduce noise.
Pair with EMA distance/cross for entries.
beginner_summary: Slope of EMA — direction and steepness of trend.
